Detailed Description

An implementation of the RTRManagedNumericConfig base class which uses the class RTRMNumConfigImpl for storage allocation.

If modifyEnabled is true (default value is false), then consumers will be permitted to modify the active value.

The value will always be within the min/max range. (ie. minValue() <= value() <= maxValue())

See Also:
RTRPublicObject, RTRPublicString, RTRPublicNumeric, RTRPublicCounter, RTRPublicGauge, RTRPublicBoolean, RTRPublicNumericRange, RTRPublicStringConfig, RTRPublicBooleanConfig, RTRPublicGaugeConfig

Constructs an RTRPublicNumericConfig variable
REQUIRE: dfltValue >= min
REQUIRE: dfltValue <= max
REQUIRE: min <= max
ENSURE: activeValue() == storeValue() == factoryDefault() == dfltValue
ENSURE: minValue() == min
ENSURE: maxValue() == max
